text: Topisaw Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to Bogue Chitto. Topisaw is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "little chestnut". Variant names are "East Topisaw Creek", "Otapasso Creek", "Otuspasso Brook", "Topisaw River", and "Topsaw River". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Lincoln County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Pike County, Mississippi
title: Topisaw Creek
